name: CMYKill
description:
Your greed seems to finally pay off. Are you prepared to defend yourself from the horrendous temple criatures? Use the power of the magic dice and unleash amazing chromatic powers!

Submitted for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Developed by Xibalboys Games:

  Sergio "Coexito" Sánchez - Programming

  Isaac "ISI" López - IU/UX design, 3D modelling and textures

  Llibert Sans - 3D modelling, animations, particles and sound design

  Alejandro Núñez - Programming

  Rubén "Rubrrig" Barriga - Concept art, cutscene and textures

  Felisa "GhoulMage" Jueves - Music production
